summary: Completed testing of Updates System with admin login, change creation, publishing, and release notes generation. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend has login authentication issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Admin PIN login (1234) not working properly - stays on login page after PIN entry

integration_issues.issue: Cannot access /admin/updates page due to login failure

passed_tests: Backend: Auto release notes generation - Working
Frontend: Login page loads with PIN interface
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend admin login authentication - PIN 1234 entry is not properly authenticating users and redirecting to admin dashboard. Backend authentication API works correctly, issue appears to be in frontend login flow or token handling.

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All Updates system APIs working correctly
success_percentage.frontend: 30% - Login interface loads but authentication fails
